nodes.bodyText: Maybe here we should probably validate that, when running as a validator, the user isn't using some of the bacon node only options (and vice versa?).

I think the validator only mode would need to be a subcommand (e.g. teku validator_client with alias teku vc) rather than a --validator-only kind of option.  Then users wouldn't be able to specify any options that weren't specifically allowed for the validator command.
Do we need this TODO? And if so can it be replaced by an issue instead as that's more likely to actually be noticed...
We might be able to just use Service here. Will take a little more jiggling to make it fit but would be a nice outcome if we can.

nodes.bodyText: Somewhere along the way we probably should support running the beacon node without it starting an internal validator service. Maybe not step one though.

Can we put a hidden = true on this?
And maybe also aliases = { "vc" }
Once #2684 is merged you'll only have data path in DataOptions - the others have moved to DataStorageOptions but the validator client won't need them anyway.
Might be nice to have a common subclass to reuse this code.
